original_title: TNA Best of the X Division Vol. 1
overview: Innovative, death defying, outragious, Xplosive, pick any words you want, and you still can't adequately describe the TNA X Division. A.J. Styles, Christopher Daniels, Chris Sabin, and Petey Williams put the X Division on the map, and performances in X Matches helped introduce new stars like Sonjay Dutt, Matt Bentley, and Samoa Joe to wrestling fans around the world. This DVD includes the best and most exciting X Division matches in TNA history.
title: TNA Best of the X Division Vol. 1
